hero.title: Modern Rental Shop
hero.subtitle: Management System
hero.description: Professional rental shop management solution. Manage products, customers, and orders efficiently with our modern, easy-to-use platform.

download.title: Available on All Platforms
download.description: Access your rental shop management from anywhere, anytime
download.mobileAppDesc: Manage your rental shop on the go with our iOS and Android apps
download.webPortalDesc: Access full features through any web browser with responsive design
download.analyticsDesc: Get insights into your business performance with detailed reports

features.title: Powerful Features
features.description: Everything you need to manage your rental business efficiently
features.orderManagementDesc: Create, track, and manage rental orders with ease. Monitor order status and history.
features.customerManagementDesc: Store customer information, track rental history, and manage customer relationships.
features.calendarSchedulingDesc: Visual calendar to track rentals, returns, and availability of products.
features.financialReportsDesc: Generate detailed financial reports, track revenue, and analyze business performance.
features.duplicatePreventionDesc: Smart system prevents duplicate orders and ensures accurate inventory management.
features.multiPlatformDesc: Access your data from iOS, Android, and web platforms seamlessly.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose AnyRent?
whyChoose.description: Join hundreds of rental businesses that trust our platform
whyChoose.easyToUseDesc: Intuitive interface designed for rental business owners, no technical skills required.
whyChoose.timeSavingDesc: Automate routine tasks and focus on growing your business instead of paperwork.
whyChoose.increaseRevenueDesc: Better inventory management and customer tracking lead to increased sales.
whyChoose.supportDesc: Get help whenever you need it with our dedicated customer support team.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Join hundreds of satisfied rental business owners

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of rental businesses that trust our platform

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about AnyRent

freeUse.question: Is AnyRent free to use?
freeUse.answer: AnyRent offers a free trial version. You can sign up and use basic features without any cost.

multipleDevices.question: Can I use it on multiple devices?
multipleDevices.answer: Yes, AnyRent supports multiple platforms. You can use it on iOS, Android, and web browsers.

dataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecure.answer: We are committed to protecting your data. All information is encrypted and stored securely in the cloud.

support.question: Do you provide customer support?
support.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 customer support through chat, email, and phone.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your business needs

footer.description: Leading rental management software in Vietnam
